err.message:
CypressError: `cy.type()` failed because it targeted a disabled element.

The element typed into was:

  > <input data-test="name-filter-input" data-test-id="item-filter" aria-label="Search by name..." tabindex="0" type="text" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Search by name..." data-ouia-component-type="PF6/TextInput" data-ouia-safe="true" data-ouia-component-id="OUIA-Generated-TextInputBase-5" value="">

Ensure the element does not have an attribute named `disabled` before typing into it.

https://on.cypress.io/type
